Title: Your Honor
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), David Phillips, Carly Hallam, Carly Hallam (story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Alexis Wilkinson (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Captain Holt's mother comes to the precinct for help when her house is robbed.
